name: maslow-gpt-api
description: An npm package for demonstration purposes using TypeScript to build for both the ECMAScript Module format (i.e. ESM or ES Module) and CommonJS Module format (CJS). It can be used in Node.js and browser applications.

scripts.first-push: npm run git-init && git add . && git commit -m "first commit" && git branch -M main && git remote add origin <YOUR_GITHUB_URL> && git push -u origin main
scripts.restart-server: pm2 start npm --name stripe-webhook -- run stripe && pm2 start npm --name my-express-server -- start && sudo service nginx restart && sudo nginx -t
scripts.push: (git add . && git commit -m "I'm a bigger pusher than Ice-T homie !!!" && git push) || exit 0
